directions: Place apples in a large bowl and sprinkle lemon juice over the top; toss to coat. Stir pecans, mayonnaise, raisins, orange zest, vanilla extract, celery seed, salt, and stevia into apples until well-combined. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: 8 apples, peeled and cut into bite-size pieces
1 cup mayonnaise (such as Hellman's®), or more to taste
1 pinch stevia powder, or to taste
title: Waldorf Salad 65
